Judul: EFFECT OF ETHANOLIC EXTRACT AND FRACTION OF ELEPHANTOPUS SCABER L ON MAST CELL INDUCED BY COMPOUND 48/80
Abstrak: Abstract:  Effect of ethanolic extract, choroform, ethylacetate and aquous fraction of Elephantopus scaber L were studied to determine on degranulation of mast cell induced by compound 48/80. The influence of cromolin, aminophyline and dipenhy-dramine also tested on compound 48/80. The results were found that the ethanolic extinct chlorofunn and ethyl acetate fraction of Elephantopus scaber L could inhibit to most cell degranulation. The chloroform fraction more effective than the ethanolic extract and the other fraction. The doses use 0,250 %; 0,500 % and 1 %.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: 2nd Author: W.M. Sirait  3rd Author: Kosasih P.W.  4th Author: Goeswin Agoes  Scan: Ena Sukmana (2005-09-02)
